Header: Two killed in an accident in Aralaganwila
Content: Two individuals have been killed and two others have been injured and admitted to hospital following an accident that took place in Polonnaruwa- Aralaganwila- Dehiaththakandiya road. Police media spokespersons office noted that a lorry had collided with a parked tipper last night resulting in the accident. The injured are currently receiving treatment at the Polonnaruwa hospital.
